explains: n. 纪念，怀念；记忆，回忆；纪念品，纪念物；记忆力
wordGroup: in remembrance of 纪念；回忆…

sentences.en: The cenotaph stands as a remembrance of those killed during the war.
sentences.cn: 矗立着的纪念碑是对战争中死难者的纪念。

sentences.en: A service was held in remembrance of local soldiers killed in the war.
sentences.cn: 为当地阵亡的战士举行了纪念仪式。

sentences.en: He wept like a child at the remembrance.
sentences.cn: 回忆起来，他就像一个小孩子似的哭了。
